metadata.title: CVE-2019-12746 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) CommunityEdition 5.0.x through 5.0.36 and 6.0.x through 6.0.19. A user logged intoOTRS as an agent might unknowingly disclose their session ID by sharing thelink of an embedded ticket article with third parties. This identifier canbe then be potentially abused in order to impersonate the agent user.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
